entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING , Cartwright
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 01:32 AM AST Tuesday 17 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Freezing Rain, -0.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Cartwright Airport 01:58 AM AST Tuesday 17 January 2023
Condition: Light Freezing Rain
Temperature: -0.4°C
Pressure: 101.7 kPa
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 95 %
Wind Chill: -5
Dewpoint: -1.1°C
Wind: E 17 km/h gust 30 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Monday night: Snow or ice pellets. Temperature rising to minus 1 by morning.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning this evening then changing to ice pellets then changing to freezing rain overnight. Snow and ice pellet amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming east 20 km/h overnight. Temperature rising to minus 1 by morning. Wind chill minus 16 this evening and minus 7 overnight. Forecast issued 4:30 PM AST Monday 16 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Freezing rain mixed with rain. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Freezing rain or rain changing to periods of drizzle or freezing drizzle near noon. Fog patches developing in the morning. Wind northeast 20 km/h becoming light near noon. High plus 1. Forecast issued 4:30 PM AST Monday 16 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of freezing rain mixed with rain. Temperature steady near zero.
entry.summary: Periods of freezing rain or rain. Fog patches. Temperature steady near zero. Forecast issued 4:30 PM AST Monday 16 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of freezing rain or snow. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Periods of freezing rain or flurries. High plus 1. Forecast issued 4:30 PM AST Monday 16 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Flurries. Low minus 1.
entry.summary: Flurries. Low minus 1. Forecast issued 4:30 PM AST Monday 16 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High zero. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. High zero. Forecast issued 4:30 PM AST Monday 16 January 2023

entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Windy. Low minus 4. Forecast issued 4:30 PM AST Monday 16 January 2023
